room_title: Escape room "The Great Art Heist" by Escape Springfield in Springfield (IL)
room_description: The Dragon’s Egg: beautiful, priceless, thought lost for years before its recent rediscovery… and your next target. Your band of thieves and outlaws has set their sights on this treasure, now held securely in the vaults of the Stone Art Museum. But you’re professionals, more than up to the challenge. Break in to the curator’s office, steal the egg, get out before anyone even knows you’re there. The countdown begins on the most daring heist of the century…
